title: Shop
subTitle: By Torroband
about: When we founded TORROBAND we had one mission in mind - the build a portable gym. Something that can actually help you gain muscle and bulk up. But how to achieve it? It's quite easy. All it has to do is be stronger than you. The bands should be so powerful that you won't be able to finish your workout with all bands combined. On the other hand, it should also be easy for beginners to work out with. That's why we offer large variety of bands, and that's the reason why people claim TORROBAND is the ultimate on-the-go gym.

items.title: Most Powerful Resistance Bands
items.description: We're proud to introduce the new TORROBAND. It's the world's most powerful resistance bands with up to 350lbs.
